title: Managerial competency development workshop for enhanced training transfer

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of organizational management and leadership
context.additional_context: Training transfer optimization program for science field managers

learning_goals: Develop an action plan to apply ≥70% of training content in the workplace within four weeks post-learning
Identify ≥3 transfer barriers through individual learning characteristic analysis and develop resolution strategies
Cultivating the ability to apply five instructional design strategies to facilitate training transfer during team member education
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
